item.description:
Peace Starts with You
Friday, July 13th, 7:30 pm
Jamaicaway Books, 676 Center Street, Jamaica Plain

Whether you are already active in the effort of bringing peace to
the world or you now wish to begin participating in this endeavor,
this seminar will introduce you to new and powerful ways of
working toward this all-important goal. The mystics of all times
and cultures have long stated that the most effective methods of
bringing change to the world lie in the inner practices of it's many
individuals. Join us in this seminar as we explore and practice
applying the powerful inner practices of the mystics that will be
paramount in bringing the earth into ever deepening peace and
harmony.

$15/$5 for Meet-up Members!
item.name: Peace Starts with You!
